xml:
Solivito N powder for solution for infusion vials Directions for administration

Dissolve in water for injections or glucose intravenous infusion for adding to glucose intravenous infusion or Intralipid ; dissolve in Vitlipid N or Intralipid for adding to Intralipid only.
Prescribing and dispensing information

Solivito N powder for reconstitution contains biotin 60 micrograms, cyanocobalamin 5 micrograms, folic acid 400 micrograms, glycine 300 mg, nicotinamide 40 mg, pyridoxine hydrochloride 4.9 mg, riboflavin sodium phosphate 4.9 mg, sodium ascorbate 113 mg, sodium pantothenate 16.5 mg, thiamine mononitrate 3.1 mg.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
